component-metadata.description:
Removes seasonality trend in input data.
Required extensions: KNIME Quick Forms (https://hub.knime.com/knime/extensions/org.knime.features.js.quickforms/latest) KNIME Math Expression (JEP) (https://hub.knime.com/knime/extensions/org.knime.features.ext.jep/latest)

in-ports.port: Data containing selected column for seasonality removal.

out-ports.port: Extra column added to original table with value x(t) - x(t-lag) where lag is the value given by user in the configuration dialog.
This table contains the removed seasonality column. This information would be needed to re-add the seasonality back into the data later.
